text: Bumetopia flavovariegata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1911.BioLib.cz - Bumetopia flavovariegata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Bumetopia flavovariegata flavovariegata (Aurivillius, 1911) * Bumetopia flavovariegata javanica Breuning, 1958 ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1911
title: Bumetopia flavovariegata
